attributes.action: Increase the foreign aids to the least developed countries to 0.7 % as recognised in the Millennium Development Goals, in these dificult times.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In his The Life You Can Save Peter Singer argues that if we saw a child in danger of drowning in a pond, we would pull him, although would get wet, or ruin a good pair of shoes. 

Based on UNICEF estimates, about 27,000 children die every day from avertable, scarcity related causes. Yet at the same time, our government does not do enough to save them.

We need to be upfront about our giving.  The Life You Can Save - the book – asks readers to come to its companion website to pledge that they will meet a standard set out in the last chapter. Will you take the pledge, and in so doing encourage others to do the same?
